text: Wow Evan Spiegel, good luck I hope you have some killer ideas :). Great to have these big ambitions, it’s a great driver to moving forward. Anything specific you’d like help or advice with at this stage? I can’t help you be the next Evan but I am an IT Manager so that would be my area of expertise.

My biggest issue which I most definitely need advice with is allocating time in to the ideas I have.  I do make good progress in learning but I do regularly lose the motivation I need in constantly putting in the necessary time and effort especially after I get back from work each day, I just find myself being so tired.  I understand it's more down to self-discipline but I was wondering if you have any advice?
